name: YaySwatches – Variation Swatches for WooCommerce
author: YayCommerce

sections.description:
YaySwatches allows you to show variation selectors as color swatches, image swatches, radio buttons, buttons, and more. Let your customers easily switch between product variations on product details page!

Showing WooCommerce color swatches for customers to choose from makes a way better shopping experience.

By transforming your variation dropdown lists into more appealing designs, you will pique the interest of the visitors and turn them into customers.

DEMO | YAYSWATCHES PRO 💎

Documentation | Free vs Pro

⚡️ FEATURES

YaySwatches is a feature-packed WooCommerce variation swatches plugin with a modern and simplified user interface. It combines pre-existing attributes and custom product attributes in a single dashboard. Just visit YaySwatches options and settings, you will see all available product attributes and choose the styles you like.

Color Swatches
Displaying colour swatches based on manually picked colours.

Automated Variation Image Swatches
Displaying swatches based on different variant images. Lateral product variation images appear when clicking on the corresponding swatch.

Customizable Swatch Bubbles
Plenty of design options including swatch shape, size, border, color, and variation attribute tooltip.

Customizable Button
You can tweak the variation button design to fit your website’s color profiles. Even better, you can display buttons for attributes like size, material, model, etc. right on shop/category page.

Powerful Attribute Options
YaySwatches works with pre-existing attributes (free version) and also custom product attributes (premium version only).

Enhanced Shop Page (PRO)
Shop and category pages are fully supported in YaySwatches Pro version. You can enable and set a limit to the number of swatch bubbles shown for each product on the shop page. This helps keep your product grid neat and tidy. Once the customer clicks on the rest of the swatch options, they can view the remaining swatches or jump to product page.

Out-of-stock Variation Visibility (PRO)
Show or hide those variations that have been sold out on product page, shop page, and categories. You can choose a predesigned style for showing/hiding variations to fit your WooCommerce store.

Making Your Products Easy to Find
The ultimate goal of this plugin is to make browsing your products or services extremely easy.

QUICK & EASY SETUP

With YaySwatches – Variation Swatches for WooCommerce plugin, it takes a few minutes to set up all WooCommerce variation swatches. It provides a more vivid appearance for your product attributes through color swatch, image swatch, automated variant image swatch, button, and radio button.
As a result, all of the items are displayed so that your customer can quickly get all the available product options you have to offer.

With YaySwatches, the customers can browse and buy your products with engagement!

To further enhance your ecommerce site, you can even send WooCommerce custom email per product, product variations or product SKUs.
sections.installation:
Setup is easy and takes less than one minute.

  1. Upload the plugin zip file to WordPress Plugins menu.
  2. Activate the plugin through the ‘Plugins‘ menu in WordPress.
  3. Go to WooCommerce > YaySwatches to start configuring WooCommerce variation swatches.
sections.faq:
Is YaySwatches plugin compatible with any WooCommerce themes?

Yes, it goes along well with all popular WooCommerce themes. In some cases, it may require additional tweaks to make it work seamlessly with your current theme.

How to use color swatches for those custom product attributes that are not added to “Attribute” menu?

This feature is available in YaySwatches Pro. You can go to WooCommerce admin > Products > Edit product and look for YaySwatches Settings, there you can find the current custom product attribute terms and design their variant selector types.

I got issues. How can I get support?

Please create a topic or contact us to get help.
Please attach screenshots of currently active WooCommerce plugins on your website to quickly get the answers. Maybe it is a third-party conflict.

Is YaySwatches GDPR-compliant?

A big yes, this WooCommerce variation swatches plugin is compliant with GDPR. It collects no sensitive information.

sections.reviews:
The most complete swatches plugin and super fast support!

By thenikica on December 8, 2023

YaySwatches is the only plugin which offers easy and working automated image variation swatches. It works even while importing thousands of variations (paint business, nuance variations).

It shows variation options on shop, category and filter pages!

It is the only swatches plugin creator who thoughtfully replies to emails and resolves issues or custom solutions in a matter of hours!

I recommend the plugin for anyone who needs reliable variations and swatches for the variations.

The creators also publish several other highly functional and easy to use plugins - at affordable rates and with no bugs.

The small license price is definitely worth it - you will realize this if you ever try to communicate with other "popular or top" plugins for variation swatches.

Always go with YayCommerce!

Special thanks to Mia, Alina and the dev team for being awesome!

Sincerely,
Nikola

Works very well for us

By aakerro on October 27, 2023

I think this plugin is underrated, so thumbs up. We tried most of the top rated swatch plugins, and though many are well made, there were always some issue, for instance conflict with the Back In Store Notifier that we like to use. Thanks!

Easy to Use and Great Support

By alin99 on August 5, 2023

YaySwatches makes quick and easy work of adding item options to your WooCommerce store. Now instead of writing out the store item colors for a selection (example.. dark yellow), you can show the customer exactly what the item option looks like.

Additionally when I had a problem, they're support was also very helpful, which was a pleasant surprise as I am using the free version of their addon.

Perfect Variations Plugin for Woocommerce

By goodzero on January 19, 2023

The plugin is very user-friendly and easy to set up. If you need to create variations for your products then this plugin will be the right choice for you. Also, the support team is very professional and responds quickly. They answered all my questions quickly and helped me a lot!

Easy to use!

By woodevpro on September 6, 2022

An all in one variation swatches plugin that gets the job done with a few clicks. Great support and overall a must have plugin for WooCommerce. Can't imagine they're truly offering LIVE CHAT support these days. 5/5 for me!

Best Swatch Plugin I've used

By georgeawino on August 18, 2022

I run a WooCommerce store, and I was looking for a plugin that could help my customers easily switch between product variations, and the tool just does that perfectly. From a personal point of view, not being a techy person, I was able to follow the documentation and do some awesome stuff.
